abstract: Profile of high school basketball player Chris Lewis, who has committed to play for Harvard University over more prominent Division I colleges; is following advice from his father Mo Lewis, who is former New York Jets linebacker; plans to study engineering as well as play basketball.
lead_paragraph: Chris Lewis, a power forward who has been receiving scholarship offers since he was in middle school, has chosen to play for Harvard, following advice from his father, Mo Lewis, the former Jets linebacker.
snippet: Chris Lewis, a power forward who has been receiving scholarship offers since he was in middle school, has chosen to play for Harvard, following advice from his father, Mo Lewis, the former Jets linebacker.

headline.main: With Eye on Harvard, Basketball Player Has 2 Careers on His Mind
headline.seo: Chris Lewis Heeds Parents’ Advice in College Decision
headline.print_headline: Harvard-Bound Player Has 2 Careers on His Mind
